reuters.title: OCEAN TRANSPORT AND TRADING PLC <OTTL.L> YEAR 1986
reuters.body: Shr net basis 21.4p vs 17.5p Div 6.1p making 9p vs 6.5p Pretax profit 37.2 mln stg vs 31.9 mln Net after tax 25.7 mln vs 20.3 mln Minority interest 700,000 vs 1.1 mln Extraordinary debit 1.9 mln vs 3.5 mln Turnover 827 mln vs 766.9 mln Note - The company said the sale of the minority holding in OCL in 1986 has transformed the balance sheet and enables it to accelerate development. REUTER 
